tables.desc: Dies ist eine Liste aller Spezialisten von The Smile Lab

service.description1: Dr. John Williams is the principal dentist at the Smile Lab. He started his journey at the Arizona School of Dentistry and Oral Health, where he became a fully qualified dentist. From graduation to this day he strives to have a positive influence on the lives of many by creating unique, beautiful and confident smiles. He enjoys all aspects of general dentistry with special interest in Preventive dentistry, Restorative dentistry and Crown and bridge work.
service.description2: Dr. Lea Brown is an oral surgeon at The Smile Lab. She obtained her Bachelor of Dental Surgery from Germany in 1997 and has over twenty years of experience in clinical practice. As an oral and maxillofacial surgeon,  Dr. Lea Brown performs many types of surgical procedures in and about the entire face, mouth, and jaw area. She treats accident victims who suffer facial injuries and offer reconstructive and dental implant surgery. She also treats patients with tumors and cysts of the jaws.
service.description3: Ellie Smith started May of 2021 her certificate III in dental assisting at The Smile Lab. Since starting as an assistant with Dr. John Williams, she has become very passionate about all things dental. She loves meeting and getting to know the patients and working alongsideDr. John Williams.

aboutUs.description1: Preventative dental care is one of the most important things you can do to keep your teeth and gums healthy. Because so many dental problems may be avoided, our goal is to help you maintain your oral health while reducing the chance of minor concerns becoming serious ones.
aboutUs.description2: Whether it's due to an emergency or years of gum disease, extracting a tooth is a simple procedure that provides immediate relief from infections, pain, or as part of a full mouth rehabilitation. An extraction is usually the best option if it is not possible to preserve the tooth healthy or return it to full function.
aboutUs.description3: Modern dental implants make replacing missing teeth more predictable and effective than ever before. We have a variety of implant choices to select from, whether you only have one lost tooth or want to replace your removable denture with something more permanent.

contacts.description1: In The Smile Lab, you can browse a list of doctors, with various specialties and expertise. Once you find the doctor you need, you can request an appointment
contacts.description2: Whenever an appointment is about to start, we'll automatically send out an email from Gmail at the pre-defined time before it begins so no one forgets your dates again.
contacts.description3: You can schedule an appointment at your convenience. You can also receive confirmation emails for successfully booked appointments. You can cancel anytime. Just give us your email address and we will send you a direct link to our Google Calendar.
